name: Quarter (WCord Games)
description:
Show off your awesome powers, let's build some "Quarter" instantly!

Stack your pieces to create a stable tower and try to break down your opponent's. Use magic to support your structure and defend it from enemies.

With spells fluttering around and pieces plummeting, Quarter will give you a good time!

Requirements Windows (Minimum)macOS (Minimum)SO  Windows XP
SO  OSX 10.8Processor  1.73 GHz Intel Pentium M or higherProcessor  Dual core or higherMemory  1 GB RAMMemory 2 GB RAMDirectX  Version 11Storage UndefinedStorage Undefined
